channel.title: Demihumans: Life in the Fallen Age
channel.description:
I'm going to be [running my new game for The Gauntlet](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LqR_YRO-n99yah0xVzY), and I'd love it if you'd join me. Some details:
* *Demihumans* is a hack of *Apocalypse World* where the apocalypse is the death of everything and everyone magical. Your enclave—a nonhuman community under the control of a human city—is under constant threat, and you play the people who are trying to keep it together and make it thrive. You can see the playbooks, moves, and so on in the [play packet](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1SFA_8JVYguQSxuw4YDpxG-PXi4c4kM14). * For the first three days, I'd ask nonwhite people only to sign up. Given the subject matter of the game and who I am, it's important to me to diversify the playtest pool. * This will be 4 sessions in total, and run on Tuesdays in November, from 7 pm to 11 pm Eastern time. Sessions will be 3 hours and will not be recorded. * You don't have to attend every session of this series, but it's appreciated. if you can. RSVP to each event separately.
[date=2019-11-05 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-11-05 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LqR_YRO-n99yah0xVzY) [date=2019-11-12 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-11-12 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LqRcUce0mXzfMvrE_BW) [date=2019-11-19 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-11-19 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LqRccKYOywsy34dkmg4) [date=2019-11-26 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-11-26 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LqRcjcPt35Fei3010zF)
* The X-card will be in use. For more information on the Gauntlet’s safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).

item.title: Demihumans: Life in the Fallen Age
item.dc:creator: @RobertBohl
item.description:
@RobertBohl wrote:

Also, this game has one slot open still. I’d be happy to have another player join.

Read full topic

item.title: Demihumans: Life in the Fallen Age
item.dc:creator: @RobertBohl
item.description:
@RobertBohl wrote:

For those who are interested, I’ve updated the play packet with the latest versions of the playbooks and other rules. I also wrote a new “unearthed” playbook, the Pixie Duster.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RobertBohl wrote:

Thanks! I sure hope that people respected that hold and those who signed up are POC.

item.title: Demihumans: Life in the Fallen Age
item.dc:creator: @DianaMoon
item.description:
@DianaMoon wrote:

Oh, would love to have joined this, but unfortunately it’s right before my only night class! If you did offer this again, I’d love to play! And thanks for doing priority for poc players~!

Read full topic

item.title: Demihumans: Life in the Fallen Age
item.dc:creator: @Gerrit
item.description:
@Gerrit wrote:

Wow! I’m so happy to read this. You, running on the Gauntlet. It’s in the middle of the night for me, so I can’t join. But that is super cool, anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Demihumans: Life in the Fallen Age
item.dc:creator: @RobertBohl
item.description:
@RobertBohl wrote:

I’m going to be running my new game for The Gauntlet, and I’d love it if you’d join me. Some details:

  • Demihumans is a hack of Apocalypse World where the apocalypse is the death of everything and everyone magical. Your enclave—a nonhuman community under the control of a human city—is under constant threat, and you play the people who are trying to keep it together and make it thrive. You can see the playbooks, moves, and so on in the play packet.
  • For the first three days, I’d ask nonwhite people only to sign up. Given the subject matter of the game and who I am, it’s important to me to diversify the playtest pool.
  • This will be 4 sessions in total, and run on Tuesdays in November, from 7 pm to 11 pm Eastern time. Sessions will be 3 hours and will not be recorded.
  • You don’t have to attend every session of this series, but it’s appreciated. if you can. RSVP to each event separately.

Wednesday, November 6, 2019 12:00 AM → Wednesday, November 6, 2019 4:00 AM Session 1
Wednesday, November 13, 2019 12:00 AM → Wednesday, November 13, 2019 4:00 AM Session 2
Wednesday, November 20, 2019 12:00 AM → Wednesday, November 20, 2019 4:00 AM Session 3
Wednesday, November 27, 2019 12:00 AM → Wednesday, November 27, 2019 4:00 AM Session 4

  • The X-card will be in use. For more information on the Gauntlet’s safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
